description: At Commando Headquarters, everything is coming together for the rescue. Jesse Tyler and his commandos are getting ready to storm Dezerad's compound to free their imprisoned friends. Greg Ross begs to join the effort, but Jesse convinces him that it's more important for him to stay home. The young serviceman is totally dedicated to the cause and moreso to his superior officer, so he yields on both fronts agreeing to man the base and manhandle Jesse. The officer tests his assistant's resilience by jamming his cock down his throat and up his ass, and then surrenders himself to the same maneuvers, earning the respect and adoration Greg is more than willing to lavish him with.
series: The Abduction Series, Part II - The Conflict
title: The Abduction Series, Part II - The Conflict
